mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (QNA_NO, USER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TYPE, QNA_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_NO.nextval, #{USER_ID}, #{QNA_TITLE}, #{QNA_CONTENT}, #{QNA_TYPE}, to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select:
